ComicInfo.Summary:
It seems that Belle is finally catching a break, or is she? With her world shattered and after nearly escaping two consecutive attacks on her life she awakens in an unfamiliar place surrounded by unfamiliar people. Are her new companions, allies or part of a larger game being played with our heroine? Another part of the mystery of these attacks is revealed in this can't miss issue!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Bong Dazo & Hedwin Zaldivar | 1 | B | Cover B | Mike Krome & Ula Mos | 2 | C | Cover C | Josh Burns | 3 | D | Cover D | Jason Metcalf & Ivan Nunes | 4 | E | The Great Philadelphia Comic Con Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 250 | Elias Chatzoudis | Missing | F | Wizard World Philadelphia Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 350 | Michael Dooney & Ula Mos | Missing | G | Wizard World Philadelphia Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 100 | Michael Dooney & Ula Mos | Missing | H | Cosplay Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 350 | Derlis Santacruz & Ula Mos | Missing | I | ZENBOX Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 150 | Alé Garza & Ula Mos | Missing |
